name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Proficient Full-Stack Developer with 10+ years of experience in full-stack development, specializing in building RESTful APIs and gRPC-based services. Expert in modern technologies including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with deep hands-on expertise in frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Skilled in database management using **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, and **Neo4j**, and adept at deploying cloud-native applications utilizing **Kubernetes** on **Azure** and **AWS**. Committed to CI/CD practices and implementing clean coding standards alongside automation practices to enhance development workflows.
Demonstrates strong problem-solving skills and a collaborative attitude, with a solid foundation in data structures and algorithms. Experienced leading development efforts for enterprise platforms that incorporate AI/ML capabilities to facilitate real-time analytics and intelligent decision-making, while ensuring compliance with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Passionate about delivering high-performance software solutions that have a significant impact on business outcomes.
